Confirms {data-navmenu="Tables"}
=====================================

### Table - Confirms by Country

```{r echo=FALSE}
df_confirmed %>%
  run_summary(varname = "Confirms", country = TRUE) %>%
  arrange(desc(Confirms)) %>%
  mutate(`Confirms as Global %` = surveytoolbox::as_percent(Confirms / sum(Confirms), rounding = 1)) -> tb_confirmed

tb_confirmed %>%
  knitr::kable()
```

Summary {data-navmenu="Tables"}
=====================================

### Table - Country Summary

```{r echo=FALSE}
list(tb_confirmed,
     tb_recovered,
     tb_deaths) %>%
  map(function(x){
    x %>%
      select(Date, `Country/Region`, contains("%")) %>%
      mutate(id = paste0(Date, `Country/Region`))
  }) %>%
  reduce(full_join, by = "id") %>%
  select(Date, `Country/Region`, contains("%")) %>%
  knitr::kable()

```
